item.title: 结构体
item.description: 第05章 结构体 #[allow(unused_variables)] #[allow(dead_code)] fn main() { struct User { username: String, email: String, sign_in_count: u64, active: bool, }; let mut user1 = User { email: String::from("someone@example.com"), username: String::from("someusername123"), active: true, sign_in_count: 1, }; user1.email = String::from("anotheremail@example.com"); } 只能标记结构体变量为mut，不能标记单个字段为mut，
